name: Normal For Norman?
description:
Step into the mind of Norman in this Virtual Reality Narrative Puzzle Game, as you piece together memories of playing the trumpet throughout his life.

Requires a Virtual Reality headset (such as an HTC Vive) capable of room scale tracking, and a 2.5m x 2.5m play area for optimal play.

Credits:

Alex Fletcher - Audio Design
Benjamin Tandy - Programming
Doruk Hasdoğan - Artist
